channel.title: Team History, anyone ?
channel.description:
[b]Hello[/b], I'm an amateur game developer/level designer since 2007, and while I've been able to complete and release several games, all my attempts to set up a team to assist me during a full development cycle were quite vain. So, I have several questions for you, Developers.
[b]H[/b]ow the idea of doing a complete remake of Half-Life originally came from ? [b]H[/b]ow large was the team at the project launch ? [b]A[/b]nd last but not least, how the new members joined the dev team ?
[b]Thank you for your time and see you soon.[/b] :slight_smile:

item.title: Team History, anyone ?
item.dc:creator: Zollux
item.description:
Hello,
I’m an amateur game developer/level designer since 2007, and while I’ve been able to complete and release several games, all my attempts to set up a team to assist me during a full development cycle were quite vain.
So, I have several questions for you, Developers.

How the idea of doing a complete remake of Half-Life originally came from ?
How large was the team at the project launch ?
And last but not least, how the new members joined the dev team ?

Thank you for your time and see you soon.
